item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Feed readers which don't take "no" for an answer (61 points | 41 comments)
2. We use our own hardware at Fastmail (320 points | 97 comments)
3. The essays of Michel de Montaigne online (118 points | 25 comments)
4. Slow deployment causes meetings (2015) (136 points | 48 comments)
5. 'AI-powered judge' takes boxing closer to brave new world it appears to seek (10 points | 5 comments)
6. Murder Mystery: GCC Builds Failing After Sbuild Refactoring (62 points | 8 comments)
7. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (341 points | 48 comments)
8. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (209 points | 91 comments)
9. The legacy of NeXT lives on in OS X (2012) (54 points | 71 comments)
10. More than 140 Kenya Facebook moderators sue after diagnoses of PTSD (233 points | 211 comments)
11. Translating 10M lines of Java to Kotlin (135 points | 128 comments)
12. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (429 points | 165 comments)
13. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (179 points | 117 comments)
14. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (162 points | 83 comments)
15. One Surprising Psychosis Treatment That Works: Learning to Live with the Voices (40 points | 37 comments)
16. Rosetta 2 creator leaves Apple to work on Lean full-time (267 points | 78 comments)
17. Introducing S2 (316 points | 156 comments)
18. JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (104 points | 27 comments)
19. Keeping a Changelog at Work (2020) (108 points | 41 comments)
20. Dividing unsigned 8-bit numbers (140 points | 60 comments)
21. Enum of Arrays (114 points | 34 comments)
22. Curl removes experimental HTTP back end in Rust (37 points | 6 comments)
23. Fault Report – and alternative to Result in F# (44 points | 14 comments)
24. The distribution of eigenvalues of GUE and its minors at fixed index (9 points | 1 comment)
25. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (188 points | 116 comments)
26. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (106 points | 44 comments)
27. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (41 points | 2 comments)
28. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (117 points | 53 comments)
29. Meet Bex, Kawasaki's Rideable Robot Goat (2022) (19 points | 13 comments)
30. Show HN: GitHub-assistant – Natural language questions from your GitHub data (33 points | 11 comments)
